CustomField.description: For sync time log records, this field stores the status of the sync request: InProgress - Indicates receipt of sync request by the server; Completed / Failed - Indicates end of processing of sync request by the server.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For sync time log records, this field stores the status of the sync request: InProgress - Indicates receipt of sync request by the server; Completed / Failed - Indicates end of processing of sync request by the server.
CustomField.label: Call Status
